  We are specifying a namespace name to workaround it.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Just sync and build. The *.g.resources file is not generated for Microsoft.PowerShell.Activities, and thus not embedded into the assembly. The will break the dll at runtime. because the generated *.g.cs file is going to load the .xaml file from assembly resource in the method 'InitializeComponent'. The generated *.g.cs file is also very different from what is generated in SD. We need to revisit this PR.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @daxian-dbw sure, lets add some tests for workflow and make it vigorous.
